positive_examples: This is an example of world war.
The world war demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed world war in this context.
A typical case of world war would involve these features.
The concept of world war applies here.
A war involving multiple nations across different continents or regions of the world.
negative_examples: This is an example of civil war, not world war.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CivilWar, or other types of War

definition: A large-scale military conflict involving multiple nations across continents.
